name: pil-stark
description: Build a stark from a PIL

scripts.test: npm run test:circuits && npm run test:helpers && npm run test:stark
scripts.test:fibonacci: npm run fibonacci_buidconst && npm run fibonacci_exec && npm run fibonacci_pil_verify && npm run fibonacci_buildstarkinfo && npm run fibonacci_buildconsttree && npm run fibonacci_prove && npm run fibonacci_verify && npm run fibonacci_gencircom && npm run fibonacci_compileverifier && npm run fibonacci_starkVerifier
scripts.test:fibonacci:gpu: npm run fibonacci_buidconst && npm run fibonacci_exec && npm run fibonacci_pil_verify && npm run fibonacci_buildstarkinfo_gpu && npm run fibonacci_buildconsttree_gpu && npm run fibonacci_prove && npm run fibonacci_verify && npm run fibonacci_gencircom && npm run fibonacci_compileverifier && npm run fibonacci_starkVerifier_gpu
scripts.test:fibonacci:C15:pil: npm run fibonacci_C15_setup && npm run fibonacci_C15_exec && npm run fibonacci_C15_pil_verify
scripts.test:fibonacci:C15:prove: npm run fibonacci_C15_buildstarkinfo && npm run fibonacci_C15_buildconsttree && npm run fibonacci_C15_prove && npm run fibonacci_C15_verify && npm run fibonacci_C15_gencircomBN128 && npm run fibonacci_C15_starkVerifierBN128
scripts.test:all: npm run all_buidconst && npm run all_exec && npm run all_pil_verify && npm run all_buildstarkinfo && npm run all_buildconsttree && npm run all_prove && npm run all_verify && npm run all_gencircom && npm run all_starkVerifier
scripts.test:all:gpu: npm run all_buidconst && npm run all_exec && npm run all_pil_verify && npm run all_buildstarkinfo_gpu && npm run all_buildconsttree_gpu && npm run all_prove && npm run all_verify && npm run all_gencircom && npm run all_starkVerifier_gpu
scripts.test:all:C18:pil: npm run all_C18_setup && npm run all_C18_exec && npm run all_C18_pil_verify
scripts.test:all:C18:prove: npm run all_C18_buildstarkinfo && npm run all_C18_buildconsttree && npm run all_C18_prove && npm run all_C18_verify && npm run all_C18_gencircomBN128 && npm run all_C18_starkVerifierBN128
scripts.test:C15: npm run verifier_C15_setup && npm run verifier_C15_exec && npm run verifier_C15_pil_verify
scripts.test:C18: npm run verifier_C18_setup && npm run verifier_C18_exec && npm run verifier_C18_pil_verify
scripts.fibonacci_buildconsttree: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/main_buildconsttree.js -c tmp/fibonacci.const -p test/state_machines/sm_fibonacci/fibonacci_main.pil -s test/state_machines/sm_fibonacci/fibonacci.starkstruct.json -t tmp/fibonacci.consttree -v tmp/fibonacci.verkey.json
scripts.fibonacci_buildconsttree_gpu: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/main_buildconsttree.js -c tmp/fibonacci.const -p test/state_machines/sm_fibonacci/fibonacci_main.pil -s test/state_machines/sm_fibonacci/fibonacci.starkstruct.gpu.json -t tmp/fibonacci.consttree -v tmp/fibonacci.verkey.json
scripts.fibonacci_prove: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/main_prover.js -m tmp/fibonacci.commit -c tmp/fibonacci.const -t tmp/fibonacci.consttree -p test/state_machines/sm_fibonacci/fibonacci_main.pil -s tmp/fibonacci.starkinfo.json -o tmp/fibonacci.proof.json -z tmp/fibonacci.proof.zkin.json -b tmp/fibonacci.public.json
scripts.fibonacci_verify: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/main_verifier.js -s tmp/fibonacci.starkinfo.json -o tmp/fibonacci.proof.json -b tmp/fibonacci.public.json -v tmp/fibonacci.verkey.json
scripts.fibonacci_gencircom: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/main_pil2circom.js -p test/state_machines/sm_fibonacci/fibonacci_main.pil -s tmp/fibonacci.starkinfo.json -v tmp/fibonacci.verkey.json -o tmp/fibonacci.verifier.circom
scripts.fibonacci_C15_setup: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/compressor/main_compressor_setup.js -r tmp/fibonacci.verifier.r1cs -p tmp/fibonacci.c15.pil -c tmp/fibonacci.c15.const -e tmp/fibonacci.c15.exec
scripts.fibonacci_C15_exec: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/compressor/main_compressor_exec.js -i tmp/fibonacci.proof.zkin.json -w tmp/fibonacci.verifier_js/fibonacci.verifier.wasm -p tmp/fibonacci.c15.pil -e tmp/fibonacci.c15.exec -m tmp/fibonacci.c15.commit
scripts.fibonacci_C15_buildconsttree: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/main_buildconsttree.js -c tmp/fibonacci.c15.const -p tmp/fibonacci.c15.pil -s test/state_machines/sm_fibonacci/fibonacci.c15.starkstruct.json -t tmp/fibonacci.c15.consttree -v tmp/fibonacci.c15.verkey.json
scripts.fibonacci_C15_prove: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/main_prover.js -m tmp/fibonacci.c15.commit -c tmp/fibonacci.c15.const -t tmp/fibonacci.c15.consttree -p tmp/fibonacci.c15.pil -s tmp/fibonacci.c15.starkinfo.json -o tmp/fibonacci.c15.proof.json -z tmp/fibonacci.c15.proof.zkin.json -b tmp/fibonacci.c15.public.json --proverAddr=0xf39fd6e51aad88f6f4ce6ab8827279cfffb92266
scripts.fibonacci_C15_verify: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/main_verifier.js -s tmp/fibonacci.c15.starkinfo.json -o tmp/fibonacci.c15.proof.json -b tmp/fibonacci.c15.public.json -v tmp/fibonacci.c15.verkey.json
scripts.fibonacci_C15_gencircomBN128: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/main_pil2circom.js -p tmp/fibonacci.c15.pil -s tmp/fibonacci.c15.starkinfo.json -v tmp/fibonacci.c15.verkey.json -o tmp/fibonacci.c15.verifier.circom
scripts.all_buildconsttree: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/main_buildconsttree.js -c tmp/all.const -p test/state_machines/sm_all/all_main.pil -s test/state_machines/sm_all/all.starkstruct.json -t tmp/all.consttree -v tmp/all.verkey.json
scripts.all_buildconsttree_gpu: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/main_buildconsttree.js -c tmp/all.const -p test/state_machines/sm_all/all_main.pil -s test/state_machines/sm_all/all.starkstruct.gpu.json -t tmp/all.consttree -v tmp/all.verkey.json
scripts.all_prove: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/main_prover.js -m tmp/all.commit -c tmp/all.const -t tmp/all.consttree -p test/state_machines/sm_all/all_main.pil -s tmp/all.starkinfo.json -o tmp/all.proof.json -z tmp/all.proof.zkin.json -b tmp/all.public.json
scripts.all_verify: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/main_verifier.js -s tmp/all.starkinfo.json -o tmp/all.proof.json -b tmp/all.public.json -v tmp/all.verkey.json
scripts.all_gencircom: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/main_pil2circom.js -p test/state_machines/sm_all/all_main.pil -s tmp/all.starkinfo.json -v tmp/all.verkey.json -o tmp/all.verifier.circom
scripts.all_C18_setup: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/compressor/main_compressor_setup.js -r tmp/all.verifier.r1cs -p tmp/all.c18.pil -c tmp/all.c18.const -e tmp/all.c18.exec --cols=18
scripts.all_C18_exec: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/compressor/main_compressor_exec.js -i tmp/all.proof.zkin.json -w tmp/all.verifier_js/all.verifier.wasm -p tmp/all.c18.pil -e tmp/all.c18.exec -m tmp/all.c18.commit
scripts.all_C18_buildconsttree: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/main_buildconsttree.js -c tmp/all.c18.const -p tmp/all.c18.pil -s test/state_machines/sm_all/all.c18.starkstruct.json -t tmp/all.c18.consttree -v tmp/all.c18.verkey.json
scripts.all_C18_prove: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/main_prover.js -m tmp/all.c18.commit -c tmp/all.c18.const -t tmp/all.c18.consttree -p tmp/all.c18.pil -s tmp/all.c18.starkinfo.json -o tmp/all.c18.proof.json -z tmp/all.c18.proof.zkin.json -b tmp/all.c18.public.json --proverAddr=0xf39fd6e51aad88f6f4ce6ab8827279cfffb92266
scripts.all_C18_verify: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/main_verifier.js -s tmp/all.c18.starkinfo.json -o tmp/all.c18.proof.json -b tmp/all.c18.public.json -v tmp/all.c18.verkey.json
scripts.all_C18_gencircomBN128: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/main_pil2circom.js -s tmp/all.c18.starkinfo.json -p tmp/all.c18.pil -v tmp/all.c18.verkey.json -o tmp/all.c18.verifier.circom
scripts.verifier_C18_setup: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/compressor/main_compressor_setup.js -r test/compressor/verifier.r1cs -p tmp/verifier.c18.pil -c tmp/verifier.c18.const -e tmp/verifier.c18.exec --cols=18
scripts.verifier_C18_exec: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/compressor/main_compressor_exec.js -i test/compressor/verifier.proof.zkin.json -w test/compressor/verifier_js/verifier.wasm -p tmp/verifier.c18.pil -e tmp/verifier.c18.exec -m tmp/verifier.c18.commit
scripts.verifier_C15_setup: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/compressor/main_compressor_setup.js -r test/compressor/verifier.r1cs -p tmp/verifier.c15.pil -c tmp/verifier.c15.const -e tmp/verifier.c15.exec --cols=15
scripts.verifier_C15_exec: NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=32000 node src/compressor/main_compressor_exec.js -i test/compressor/verifier.proof.zkin.json -w test/compressor/verifier_js/verifier.wasm -p tmp/verifier.c15.pil -e tmp/verifier.c15.exec -m tmp/verifier.c15.commit

author: Polygon Hermez
